title: How to Hand Make Recycled Paper
brief_description: An easy to follow video demonstrating how to handmake unique and beautiful paper by recycling your own waste paper at home. Its clean, its fun and its simple. An ideal hobby or craft for the creative individual, groups of friends, or as a classroom exercise. There are sections covering equipment, the basic paper making process, creative techniques and uses for your personalised paper. Entertaining and educational. Presented by Louise Arnott and Hector Malacaria, two energetic, young people, helping to create a cleaner and healthier environment.
